Title: Prohibits any person or applicant from receiving a license from the office of cannabis management in certain circumstances
Summary: Provides that any applicant who cultivates for sale or sells cannabis, cannabis products, medical cannabis, or any product marketed or labeled as such, without having an appropriate registration, license or permit therefor, shall be deemed ineligible to receive or renew a license to sell cannabis.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to prohibiting any person or applicant from receiving a license from the office of cannabis management in certain circumstances
